generated_text:
- road: The cobblestone surface in the center of the image, extending from the foreground to the background, is clearly a road.
- sidewalk: The paved areas on both sides of the road, bordered by curbs and buildings, are designated for pedestrians and are elevated, fitting the definition of sidewalk.
- building: The structures on both sides of the street and the large white building in the background are all buildings.
- vegetation: The tree with dense foliage on the right side of the street and the bushes near the center are examples of vegetation.
- terrain: The grassy area visible behind the fence in the background is a terrain.
- person: A person wearing dark clothing is visible walking on the left side of the road.
- car: The Mercedes-Benz logo visible in the foreground indicates the presence of a car.
